module.name: ps_faviconnotificationbo
module.displayName: Order Notifications on the Favicon ache
module.description: Get notified when you get new order, new client or new message directly on your browser tab of your back office even if you are working on another page
module.author: PrestaShop
module.confirmUninstall: ¿Estás seguro que quieres desinstalar este módulo?
